name: krishimart
description: krishimart is a multi-vendor e-commerce platform that allows users to create their own shops, showcase products, and host events. It provides a seamless shopping experience with 24/7 support and ensures the best user experience.
features: Create and manage your own shop
Secure transactions with multiple payment options
User-friendly interface for vendors and buyers
return_policy: Customers can return products within 7 days if they are unused and in their original packaging.
payment_methods: Supports credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and cash on delivery.
customer_support: Available 24/7. Reach us via email at support@krishimart.com or through live chat on our website.
